thread.title: 'I came to heaven from hell' says migrant after leaving Lesbos camp

title: 'I came to heaven from hell' says migrant after leaving Lesbos camp
text:
'I came to heaven from hell' says migrant after leaving Lesbos camp Thursday, November 30, 2017 - 00:50 
An Afghan asylum seeker describes camp conditions in Lesbos as ''hell'' and says arriving in mainland Greece feels like ''heaven''. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
An Afghan asylum seeker describes camp conditions in Lesbos as "hell" and says arriving in mainland Greece feels like "heaven". Rough cut (no reporter narration). Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2IyoiNe
